column5: Anyone have a fishing report on mille lacs? heading up Aug.1st. Also, do you know of a good place to eat breakfast in grand marais,mn.? Thanks

Left LDML on July 7, so I can't help you with a fishing report. We usually stay in Grand Marais on the way up and often eat breakfast at the Harbor Inn. It's good food, but don't plan on speedy service. Here's the link:http://www.bytheharbor.com/rest.html

Lacs been good right from the opener. Fish in a little deaper water this time of the year. Sunken Islands are a good bet and weed lines heading to deeper water. Leaches , minnows worms work well for me.
any of you guys fish out of maki bay resort? fished out of this camp for many years,wondering whats going on there.heard smallies have moved into the lake.any responses appreciated

We stayed at maki bay too,although its been a few years back. They have a road to the resort now,but heard its pretty rough. We have been catching more smallmouths every year,I kinda wish they wasn't there,but a lot of people enjoy them. The slot has really helped the walleyes too.

We fished LDML from July 19-July 25 and it was one of the best trips ever,many fish in the 19-25" catagory. {all big ones C&R} Live bait worked the best on spinners and jigs.Water temp just reached 70 for a short time one day. Fish were not very deep. The gang at Open Bay Lodge did a great job as usual. We can wait till nest year!! Dave
